data.name: Football Manager Touch 2018 - Rise from the Ashes Challenge
data.detailed_description: You may no longer be in administration but, with no players under contract and nothing in the transfer budget, the start of the season looms large with plenty of work still to do. Can you assemble a squad of free agents and guide the club to safety?
data.about_the_game: You may no longer be in administration but, with no players under contract and nothing in the transfer budget, the start of the season looms large with plenty of work still to do. Can you assemble a squad of free agents and guide the club to safety?
data.short_description: You may no longer be in administration but, with no players under contract and nothing in the transfer budget, the start of the season looms large with plenty of work still to do. Can you assemble a squad of free agents and guide the club to safety?
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Greek, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista (SP2), 7 (SP1), 8/8.1, 10 (1703/Creators Update) – 64-bit or 32-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4, Intel Core or AMD Athlon – 2.2 GHz +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 – 256MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8.5, 10.9.5, 10.10.5, 10.11.6, 10.12.5, 10.13 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 – 1.8 GHz +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 – 256MB VRAM
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL: 2.1

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS, Ubuntu 14.04.5 LTS – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4, Intel Core or AMD Athlon – 2.2 GHz +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000/4000, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 – 256MB VRAM
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL: 2.1
